org.osmdroid.samplefragments.drawing

Class PressToPlotWithoutWrapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • org.osmdroid.samplefragments.BaseSampleFragment
        • org.osmdroid.samplefragments.drawing.PressToPlot
          • org.osmdroid.samplefragments.drawing.PressToPlotWithoutWrapping

  • public class PressToPlotWithoutWrapping
extends PressToPlot
    A simple sample to plot markers with a long press. It's a bit of noise this in the class that is used to help the osmdroid devs troubleshoot things. Map replication is OFF for this sample (only viewable for numerically lower zoom levels (higher altitude)) Notehttps://github.com/osmdroid/osmdroid/pull/722 for more information and the discussion associated with this. created on 11/19/2017.
    Since:
    6.0.0
